hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"I bought Barirah and her masters stipulated that her Wala' should go to them. I mentioned that to the Prophet and he said: 'Set her free, and Al-Wala' is to the one who pays the silver.' So I set her free and the Messenger of Allah called her and gave her the choice concerning her husband. She said: 'Even if you gave me such and such, I would not stay with him,' so she chose herself and her husband was a free man

chapter.ara-name: باب خِيَارِ الأَمَةِ تُعْتَقُ وَزَوْجُهَا حُرٌّ
chapter.eng-name: Giving The Choice To A Slave Woman Who Is Set Free And Whose Husband Is A Free Man
